name: Diving to Atlantis
description:
You finally found Atlantis! But you'll have to dive and go down the  deepest sea to reach that magical realm.

Controls:

WASD : Move your character

Space : Throws your lantern (if there are too many fishs, you can get some space throwing it);

Open assets:

Music : "Boss' Temple Underwater Theme" by Señor Moreno 2020

Cover : "Underwater Fantasy" by ansimuz.com

Made with Squids game engine:
